#summary Errata and Design Notes for the 2.4 Ghz Radio Front-End
#labels Phase-Support

= Rev A =

== Errata ==

 * External TCXO is connected to MAX2830 XTAL pin (28) instead of CTUNE pin (29)
 * TCXO power supply digital, ground analog
 * Mark for 1. pin for baluns not visible enough
 * C105, C106 names covered by vias in documentation

== Notes ==

 * Via test points for potential test pins (clock out, lock detect) would have been useful
